comments.body: We don't need to use the full angle bracket syntax when the displayed label and target are exactly the same.

Occasionally the version without the angle brackets triggers a warning, and these were. I only added the angle brackets where I couldn't eliminate the errors any other way. I'll try it once more, though, before I give up and put the duplication in the code.

comments.body: This isn't about old vs. new FreeBSD versions, but rather about a change in their ports tree, which is maintained separately.
ports tree looks the same, change seems to have been in the binary repos. I left 'older versions' in there in case the changes didn't apply to the 'archived' ones.
